findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fee, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketingDivisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token requirement for adding liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change airdrop address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the airdrop address.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can manually swap tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to manually swap tokens.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable before and after presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: addLiquidity() function is not used
findings.description: The addLiquidity() function is not being utilized.

findings.title: Liquidity fee goes to marketing and airdrop addresses
findings.description: The liquidity fee is sent to marketing and airdrop addresses instead of being utilized for its intended purpose.

findings.title: Public Access Modifier in transferToAddressETH Function
findings.description: The transferToAddressETH function has a public access modifier, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: _transferStandard function sends burn amount to dead address
findings.description: The _transferStandard function is sending the burn amount to a dead address.
